mapper.select: SELECT u.aoId,u.roleId,u.account,o.nameSpace,o.moduleName,o.operating,o.alias,o.method, LOWER(o.nameSpace + '-' + o.moduleName + '-' + o.operating) AS pageId, o.sequence, (CASE u.status WHEN 'true' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END) AS status, (CASE a.aoStatus WHEN 'true' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END) AS aoStatus FROM (SELECT * FROM SysOperating WHERE method=#{method}) o LEFT JOIN (SELECT aoId,roleId,account,nameSpace,moduleName,status,operating FROM SysAuthOperating WHERE roleId=#{roleId} AND (account=#{account} OR account='') AND nameSpace=#{nameSpace}) u ON u.nameSpace=o.nameSpace AND u.moduleName=o.moduleName AND u.operating=o.operating LEFT JOIN (SELECT roleId,account,nameSpace,moduleName,aoStatus FROM SysAuthModule WHERE roleId=#{roleId} AND (account=#{account} OR account='') AND nameSpace=#{nameSpace}) a ON u.roleId=a.roleId AND u.account=a.account AND u.nameSpace=a.nameSpace AND u.moduleName=a.moduleName ORDER BY (CASE WHEN u.account!='' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)
